column5: Beautiful Ocean views Condo – Great location, great amenities, and great for the entire family! Unique – 3 bedroom condo combination. 2 bedroom 2 bath sleeps eight, pass through door to adjoining 1 bed, 1 bath, sleeps five. Great for multiple families and kids! Combined, our condos provide about 2,000 sq. feet of living area. Two living rooms, two dining areas and two kitchens!
column8: Unique 3BR with 2 Pools and a Gorgeous Ocean View!
